mapper.select: SELECT QUOTATION_NO AS quotationNo, CUSTOMER_CD AS customerCd, CUSTOMER_NAME AS customerName, TO_CHAR(QUOTATION_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS quotationDt, TO_CHAR(VALID_PERIOD, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS validPeriod, EMP_CD AS empCd, PHONE AS phone, DELIVERY_LOCATION AS deliveryLocation, TO_CHAR(EXPECTED_DELIVERY_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS expectedDeliveryDt, PAYMENT_TERMS AS paymentTerms FROM QUOTATION ORDER BY QUOTATION_NO
